about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a world infected by a devastating zombie epidemic. In this apocalypse, you assume the role of a brave soldier whose mission is to uncover the truth behind the outbreak and find a desperately needed cure. The game unfolds in an exciting narrative divided into thrilling chapters, each revealing new plot twists and unique challenges.

Explore dark and dangerous landscapes as you confront hordes of bloodthirsty zombies. Survival depends on your ability to unravel hidden secrets in every corner. As you progress, you'll unlock a wide variety of weapons, from pistols and shotguns to assault rifles and rocket launchers, each with its own strategic advantage.

The best part is that each new chapter is completely free. We want every player to enjoy the experience without barriers. Additionally, we will periodically release updates that include gameplay enhancements and exciting additional maps.

The game will stay fresh and thrilling with the constant arrival of new chapters that expand the story and offer even more intense challenges. Get ready to face new enemies, shocking revelations, and exciting missions in each episode.

Are you ready for the ultimate battle for survival? Dive into this infected world and uncover the hidden truth in every corner before it's too late.

content_descriptors.notes: Dark Zone: An exhilarating first-person shooter game where players battle hordes of zombies. The game features scenes of violence and blood as players confront the undead. However, it does not contain adult content, explicit nudity, or sexual themes. Dark Zone is designed for an audience aged 18 and older due to its intense combat nature.

name: Dark Zone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100 / AMD Ryzen 3 2300X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 560 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 3.6 GHz or higher: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X or Intel i5-8600K or newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2060 6GB or AMD RX Vega 56 8GB or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Temas sensíveis

short_description: Immerse in an infected world. As a soldier, seek the truth of a zombie epidemic. Explore dark landscapes, uncover secrets, and fight for survival. Unravel the origin before it's too late. Ready to face the truth?
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
